System requirements in torrent description are probably for Portal 1. 
Portal 2 requires CPU with SSE2 and video card supporting at least shader model 2.0b.

My friend has a paid version on steam, will we be able to play Co-op multiplayer together?

Detected: WS.Reputation.1  
Researched it and it is removed because of a bad rating from: "Data provided by software publishers".
Restored and chose to exclude file from scan.
Clean and working!
Thanks!

google "Portal 2 - Coop-Launcher"
go to the first result and click on the link provided in the blog. haven't been able to test it out though yet so good luck.
